strings.Value: "I am an agent on a secret mission!"
"I'm {name}, I was just passing by."
[Attack] "Die, monster!"
"I have to go."
"I was hired to exterminate all the goblins in the surrounding woods!"
"Local ruler sent me to spy around the Kingdom of eternal summer, where people have never seen snow!"
"I act as an ally of orcs in their struggle against the powerful sorcerer!"
"Of course! And if you pay me, I'll send you a guide, who'll show you the shortest way!"
[Attack] "No, idiot, I'm fooling you! Prepare to die!"
"You need to go south, always south."
[Attack] "I've changed my mind. Die!"
"I need to think about it. While I am, I'll go about my business."
"Of course! And if you let me go, I'll explain how can you get there!"
"Great! I'm going home now, and then I'll send my best ranger to you. He'll arrive tomorrow morning."
{n}With their mouths open, three hill giants stare at you, puzzled. Finally, after a long pause, one of them points his finger at you.{/n} "You..."
"Where do you think you're going?"
"Ask {mf|him|her}, Grug!"
"SHUT UP, BREK!"
{n}The third giant has been silent all this time. Judging by his expression, he seems to be trying to figure out what's going on.{/n}
{n}Brek licks his lips with his huge, sore-covered tongue.{/n} "Let's eat them, Grug! We'll eat them, right?"
{n}Grug answers with a menacing smile.{/n} "What do YOU think?"
{n}Grug and Brek exchange looks. The third giant scratches his head and looks at them expectantly.{/n} "What mission?"
{n}Narrowing his eyes, Brek glares at you.{/n} "It seems to me {mf|he|she}'s lying, Grug! For {mf|him|her}, lying is as easy as breathing."
"I agree, Brek."
"Grug! I've never tasted a goblin before."
"So what? I don't care what you tasted and what you didn't."
{n}Brek spits on the ground, irritated. Then his gaze falls on you.{/n}
{n}Grug's face twists in thought, then he grunts dismissively. It looks as if he doesn't care about orcs and sorcerers.{/n}
{n}Grug's thunderous laughter almost deafens you.{/n} "No, this won't work with us!"
{n}Brek's eyes light up.{/n} "You say it's always warm there? With soft grass all around?"
{n}Clearing his throat, Grug turns back to you.{/n} "Who're you?"
{n}Brek rubs his stomach and looks at Grug pleadingly.{/n} "Grug, come on…"
{n}Grug clicks his tongue, annoyed.{/n} "Don't even start!"

"Grug... remember when I let you have that juicy lamb? You said you'd owe me if I gave it to you! You promised!" {n}Brek leans forward to whisper in Grug's ear, but the giant's 'whisper' echoes throughout the cave.{/n} "After he shows us the way, we can do with this guide whatever... we... like..."
{n}Grug sighs.{/n} "Damn you… Fine, here's your money, little one. When will this guide of yours arrive?"
{n}Grugs looks at you suspiciously.{/n} "No, first you tell us! Spit it out!"
"How about that? Soon as I got bored of not fighting, a fight came and found us!"
"Eaten by a giant... Is that a good end, oh {g|Groetus}Groetus{/g}? I must consider the matter."
{n}With violent giggling, Nok-Nok bares his weapon.{/n} "These good enemies! Big enough for Hero Nok-Nok!"
